mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Category(CategoryID, name, cnt, rdate) VALUES(category_seq.nextval, #{name}, 0, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT CategoryID, CategoryName, cnt, Rdate, seqno, Visible FROM Category ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT CategoryID, CategoryName, cnt, Rdate, seqno, Visible FROM Category WHERE visible='Y' ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT CategoryID, CategoryName, cnt, Rdate FROM Category WHERE CategoryID = #{CategoryID}
mapper.update: UPDATE category SET name = #{name}, cnt = #{cnt} WHERE categoryID = #{categoryID}
UPDATE category SET seqno = seqno - 1 WHERE categoryID=#{categoryID}
UPDATE category SET seqno = seqno + 1 WHERE categoryID=#{categoryID}
UPDATE category SET visible='Y' WHERE categoryID=#{categoryID}
UPDATE category SET visible='N' WHERE categoryID=#{categoryID}
